summary.span: 可切换状态的控件基类，例如 。

span.span: Base class for controls that can switch states, such as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是，这意味着，它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 一个映像或一个面板） 的单个对象。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 属性指定的状态。The property specifies the state of the . 属性指定是否具有两个或三个状态。The property specifies whether the has two or three states. ## 自定义切换按钮控件Customizing the ToggleButton Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 你可以修改默认提供独特外观的控件。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和特定于状态，请参阅[ToggleButton Syles 和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-syles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToggleButton Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-syles-and-templates.md). 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 设置 visual 属性仅会产生作用如果该属性既存在按钮控件的默认模板中，通过设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IsChecked As Nullable(Of Boolean)
public: property Nullable<bool> IsChecked { Nullable<bool> get(); void set(Nullable<bool> value); };

span.span: Gets or sets whether the is checked.

value.span: 如果 已选中，则为 ；如果 未选中，则为 false；否则为 。

span.span: if the is checked; false if the is unchecked; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承自的控件时此属性是确定其行为`null`。A control that inherits from determines its behavior when this property is `null`. ## CheckBoxCheckBox 当属性设置为 true，用户可以单击选取三个可能的状态。When the property is set to true, a user can click a to pick three possible states. 下表描述了三种的状态。The following table describes the three states of a . |状态 State of the | 的值Value of | |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |已选中Checked|`true`| |未选中状态Unchecked|`false`| |不确定Indeterminate|`null`| 如果为 false，仍以编程方式，你可以将此属性设置为`null`将处于不确定的状态，但用户无法设置为中间状态通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。If is false, you can still programmatically set this property to `null` to put the in an indeterminate state, but the user cannot set the to the indeterminate state through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## RadioButtonRadioButton 如果将此属性设置为`null`上、处于未选中状态。If you set this property to `null` on a , the is unchecked. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* `IsChecked`=""/><*object* `IsChecked`=""/> \- 或 -\- or - <*对象* `IsChecked`="{[X:null 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `IsChecked`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例创建设置为不确定状态。The following example creates a set to an indeterminate state. [!code-xaml[CheckBox_Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CheckBox_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]
